long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Mindful Moment promotes conscious browsing habits by displaying a gentle full-screen overlay prompting you to "Think about what you are doing" or a customized text before accessing potentially distracting websites or domains. With customizable domain lists, adjustable delays, and the ability to block entire domains or specific routes and even while switching tabs, this extension gives you a moment to pause and reconsider your online activities, helping you stay focused and make more intentional choices about your browsing.
